com.embeddedunveiled.serial.internal

Class SerialComPlatform

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.embeddedunveiled.serial.internal.SerialComPlatform

  • public final class SerialComPlatform
extends java.lang.Object

    Identifies various hardware and software platform attributes like operating system and CPU architecture etc.

    • Method Detail

      • getOSType

        public final int getOSType()
                    throws java.lang.SecurityException,
                           SerialComUnexpectedException

        Identifies the operating system on which scm library is running.

        Returns:
        SerialComManager.OS_UNKNOWN if platform is unknown to scm otherwise one of the SerialComManager.OS_XXXX constant
        Throws:
        java.lang.SecurityException - if java system properties can not be accessed
        SerialComUnexpectedException - if the "os.name" java system property is null

      • getCPUArch

        public final int getCPUArch(int osType)
                     throws java.lang.SecurityException,
                            SerialComUnexpectedException,
                            java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                            java.io.IOException

        Identifies CPU architecture scm library is running on.

        Packages that are compiled for i386 architecture are compatible with i486, i586, i686, i786, i886 and i986 architectures. Packages that are compiled for x86_64 architecture are compatible with amd64 architecture.

        Returns:
        SerialComManager.ARCH_UNKNOWN if platform is unknown to scm otherwise one of the SerialComManager.ARCH_XXXX constant
        Throws:
        java.lang.SecurityException - if java system properties can not be accessed
        SerialComUnexpectedException - if the "os.arch" java system property is null
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - if file "/proc/cpuinfo" can not be found for Linux on ARM platform
        java.io.IOException - if file operations on "/proc/cpuinfo" fails for Linux on ARM platform

      • getJAVAABIType

        public final int getJAVAABIType()
                         throws SerialComUnexpectedException

        Conformance to the standard ABI for the ARM architecture helps in inter-operation between re-locatable or executable files built by different tool chains.

        Returns:
        either ABI_ARMHF or ABI_ARMEL constant value as per identification
        Throws:
        SerialComUnexpectedException - if "java.home" java system property is null
